item.title: HW2 Solution posted
item.dc:creator: John T. Foster
item.description:
To assist in your test preparation, I have posted the solution to Homework 2 on the Course Materials page.

Regarding the exam, you are allowed 1 sheet front and back for notes/formulas. Calculators will be allowed, but no cell phone calculators so please prepare accordingly.

item.title: Lab 1 Instructions
item.dc:creator: John T. Foster
item.description: Lab 1 will involve conducting unconfined compressive tests on various rock samples, constructing stress-strain curves, and estimating the rock's Young's Modulus. The instructions for Lab 1 can be found here or on the Course Materials page.

item.title: 1/29 Lecture Delayed
item.dc:creator: John T. Foster
item.description: I didn't have the time to record the lecture I missed on 1/19 while traveling. This lecture will be made up likely, later next week you will have an additional lecture to watch. I will provide more information in class on Tuesday.

item.title: First Lab
